WRITING.TITLE: TEACHERS can you please give me advice for a YRDSB interview?
WRITING.TEXT:
I have an interview for the York Region District School Board next week and I am extremely nervous. I have over 10 years experience in the child care area but interviews make me freeze up and I end up not feeling as confident. I know there is a 15 minute written practicum and then a 40 minute interview.
TEACHERS or anyone with experience in this interview can you please give me advice??????!?!!?!
What is the most embarrassing thing you have done in an interview?
photographing them, studying them, playing with them lol anything that would be awesome!!!!!
oh .... btw I have a very small mouth and my boyfriends dick is huge..... so be creative! lol I have a hard time giving it because the whole time I'm thinking *careful of teeth... careful of teeth*
with wild animals

I was 15 by boyfriend was 16 we were waiting for a while... but I felt too young and wasn't ready yet... anyway couple months later we were FINALLY going to loose our virginity to each other! We were in his basement on a blow up bed... ended up in the bathroom... when we finished he said he was staring at my as in the mirror the whole time and I was actually his second! ... yup... good times!
a jeep with no doors or a huge truck either one... NEEDS HUGE TIERS !!!
me too
I'm 28 years old... I still sleep with my door shut.. just from this movie.. My friends tricked me into seeing this movie
plus cheeses!
my sister and I grew up with cream cheese on bagels with chips crushed up on top lol (pringles were the best combo)

My parents doing it as well... my eyes still bleed till this day.. and yes I know they are human too but MY EEYEEEESS My ears also bleeed a little
The funniest though... is my boyfriend and I came home late one night and he went in first... haha big mistake.. never forget that one!

The girl who made me feel like shit in high school and thought it was hilarious ... it would have felt so good to punch her out infront of all her friends,
also my ex "best" friend it would have just felt soo good she was a fucking bitch! Haven't seen or talked to her in years but if I ever ran into her I would still love to punch the teeth out of her face!
I was new to the site... MY BAD! =P
the stupid clicks all the girls had growing up...

Wanna hear something even more creepier.. This is words right out of Robert Munsch's mouth...
Love You Forever started as a song.
Ill love you forever, Ill like you for always, as long as Im living my baby youll be.
I made that up after my wife and I had two babies born dead. The song was my song to my dead babies. For a long time I had it in my head and I couldnt even sing it because every time I tried to sing it I cried. It was very strange having a song in my head that I couldnt sing.
For a long time it was just a song but one day, while telling stories at a big theatre at the University of Guelph, it occurred to me that I might be able to make a story around the song.
Out popped Love You Forever, pretty much the way it is in the book.
My regular publisher felt that it was not really a kids book and I ended up doing it with another publisher.
One day the publisher called up and said This is very strange. It is selling very well in retirement communities in Arizona. It is selling in retirement communities where kids are illegal. This is supposed to be a childrens book. What is going on?
Grownups are buying it for grownups!
In fact, it turned out that parents buy it for grandparents and grandparents buy it for parents and kids buy it for everybody and everybody buys it for kids.
As a matter of fact, everybody buys it for everybody. Thats why it sells a lot of copies. I think its my best book. So far it has sold about 15,000,000 copies.
Everybody makes up their own song for this book. I would like to put different versions of the song up on this site, now that the site has sound on it. If you send me your version, either as a tape or an audio file or a MR3 file, I will try to put it up in the LOVE YOU page. If lots of people send me their versions, I will not be able to put them all up, but I would like to hear them even if I cant put them on the site.
The way I sing it in the story is just MY version. You are supposed to make up your own.
http://robertmunsch.com/book/love-you-forever

WRITING.TITLE: Fondant users...
WRITING.TEXT:
I have been making cakes for a while now and I am still confused about how to properly cover a cake with fondant... I cannot find the answer to my question and was wondering if anyone could please help me.
So once I have covered the cake with fondant it looks good. Then an hour later I look at it again and it is either taring or there is a huge bubble in the side of the cake. How do I prevent this from happening? What am I doing wrong? How much icing should I put under the layer of fondant? How thick should the fondant be??? Is it the type of fondant I am using? (Satin Ice) Is it the colour I am adding to the fondant??
well done =)

my friends back in high school had a room mate he was quiet and painted a lot... anyway a few years later we saw a whole article on him. Long story short.... he basically slammed a poor old man on a driveway giving out Christmas cards the night before Christmas over the head with a shovel. =(
it's 2am I probably wont be sleeping for another hour... I blame reddit and modern family And I work every morning at 7am =(

my hair, my teeth, my tits and my beautiful blue eyes =)

I was also bullied a few times this is not the way to solve a problem but oh damn if I could go back in time and realize they are just people too and I could have socked them in the face knowing I wouldn't get killed over it I wish I could go back in time just to do that to embarrass them in front of all their friends

There are two things I would tell myself.
1. Live a little and do some crazy things that don't matter as much as when your a kid then when you're an adult and have responsibilities.
2. Figure out a profession I would enjoy in life but also make more money in. Yes I know money isn't everything.... but these days to live and play a little you need extra money on the side. The biggest thing I want in life is to have a big family and truly I have no idea how people afford kids these days AND A PET! I NEED A DOG IN MY LIFE! I love my job but there are so many other ways I could have gone with my life.... it's kinda crazy how small choices can change your whole path.
